text: Macrocoma niedobovae is a species of leaf beetle endemic to Socotra. It was described by Stefano Zoia in 2012. It is named after Jana Niedobová, who collected part of the specimens studied. ==References== niedobovae Category:Beetles of Asia Category:Beetles described in 2012 Category:Endemic fauna of Socotra
title: Macrocoma niedobovae
